title: Photodex ProShow Producer 8.0.3645 Incl Activator [SadeemPC]
description:
Photodex ProShow Producer 8.0.3645

Build stunning professional slideshows with unlimited production control, powerful creative tools and time-saving shortcuts. Instant + custom creation for professionals. Add photos, videos + text. Enhance with built-in FX. Built-in music library + advanced creative tool. Publish for any screen, with 40+ output formats.	

Styles & transitions
Over 950 built-in effects for your photos and videos.

Pan, zoom, 3D, rotate
Just click and drag to create your own motion effects.

Timing control
Set times for slides and effects. Trim video + song length.

Instant show creation
Let ProShow do all the work with the show wizard.

Keyframe animations
Create custom effects with keyframed motion and fx.

Image editing
Crop, vignette, blur, color adjust and more.

Music library
330+ royalty free tracks for personal & commercial shows.

Mask & adjust
Use masks and adjustment layers for total control.

Custom branding
Add watermarks and custom icons. Make it yours.

It's like having a production studio at your finger tips.
Only ProShow Producer gives you the features of a video editor with the ease-of-use of a slideshow tool. Blend photos and videos together in nearly any way imaginable. Use the built-in video trimmer to edit your video clips and use just the portion you want. Turn videos to black and white or sepia with one-click colorization effects. Adjust the speed of your video clip to create cool, slow-mo sequences and apply any of Producer's slide styles to your video.

Royalty-free music and audio controls.
Browse the royalty-free music library, instantly available to use in your shows. 300+ songs and 25 sound FX hand-picked licensed for personal and commercial use. Use built-in audio controls to crop songs, crossfade multiple tracks, record voiceovers and set custom fades.

Create titles that impress.
Add captions and titles that rival Hollywood. Use textures and customize motion to create fantastic animations. Easily create proofing shows with text macros from EXIF or IPTC metadata.

Protect your images and brand your business.
Add a custom watermark to your slideshow to protect your images. Copy protect your discs with password protection, playback security and prevent piracy of your images. Use Producer's branding feature to promote your business. Add a custom startup screen, icons and more.

Publish anywhere
Publishing your slideshows is easy, with over 40 popular formats for watching on TV, online, and devices. Easily post shows onYouTube and SmugMug. Burn directly to DVD, Blu-ray, AVCHD and CD. Add a professional touch with Hollywood-style movie menus.

Minimum Requirements:
- Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
- 1024 x 768 display
- 1GHz+ processor or better
- 2GB system memory
- Accelerated 3D graphics â€“ 64MB ram
- DirectX 8.0 or better
- DVD+R/RW/-R/RW writer
- 70 MB hard drive space

What's New in ProShow Producer 8.0 
http://www.photodex.com/proshow/producer#new
